TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ImportCollection Inherits ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

summary.span: 提供 类的实例集合，该类表示要导入到 XML Web services 的文档。

span.span: Provides a collection of instances of the class representing documents to be imported into the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应到 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)``括起的根元素``元素。The class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `` element that is enclosed by the root `` element. 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的一个典型用途`ImportCollection`类。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `ImportCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在集合中的项的数目等于集合的容量，则容量被加倍通过自动重新分配在内部数组，才能插入新元素。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`参数等于、`import`参数添加到末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `import` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Insert` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method. 若要查看用户定义的源`CreateImport`方法，请参见示例随附类。To view the source for the user-defined `CreateImport` method, see the example included with the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 跟在移除的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Remove` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Remove` method.
